system.biography:
TitleFFF 802a Gargu-Araki Queen
Birthday07 Peonu 705
AppearanceAge 14, height 3’0”, massive frame (size 4), weight 110 lb, pallid complexion, tawny hair, tawny eyes.
Medical/PsycheObesity/Terraphobia (Severe fear of the ground, test at WIL×1).
Size0
Armor
Other Equipment
Valuables
NotesSkill MLs have been adjusted to account for gravid obesity.

Biography

Feeri is queen to a nation of Gargu-araki, shared by tribal kings who wage inter-tribal warfare for conjugal rights. She is content to watch the tableau of bloody murder amongst her children from the bower of her tree, indifferent to the petty schemes of kings. To Feeri, life is measured by the long seasons, by the eggs laid, and the satisfaction of a gut eased from the constant ache of hunger. Kings come and go, but Feeri remains, able to satisfy her appetites at her whim.

Feeri has grown so large since she first climbed into her bower that she can no longer leave her nest, nor can she scale a tree safely anymore. She has developed a corresponding fear that if she were to descend, some wild animal would easily catch and devour her.

Feeri is a prolific egg-layer, and her appetites are correspondingly monstrous. As her body churns out the eggs of future Araki generations, her hunger can only be sated by enormous quantities of meat—raw, cooked, or even rotted. She is especially fond of bast, so much so that her kings ensure at least one nearby tree is constantly hung with prey (be it animal, gargun, or human) until it is ripe enough to be made into the sausage. Her constant eating ensures a steady supply of the excretory seasoning used in making bast. Slaves laboriously bottle or gather it up by the armful. The atrocious smells that emanate from her den can be detected miles away. The Araki guard it so vigorously that even local scavengers and predators know to avoid the area.

More than once, Feeri has killed a king who arrogantly sated his lusts on her. Two she smothered with her corpulent bulk as they mindlessly coupled with her. A third broke his neck from the fall after Feeri caused him to stumble out of her bower. Her “suitors” now know to approach her with gifts of coins, polished stones, bright feathers, or meat to sate her hunger and feed her pride long enough to get in a good thrust.

HOOKS

“Fa! Spoilt!” The current batch of meat destined to be sausage was allowed to hang too long before marinating and is now spoilt. Gargun hunting parties are looking to restock. The queen swears that live prey left to expire hanging upside down makes the best bast, so one or more PCs is captured alive and taken to hang from the “gibbet” tree. Their companions don’t have long to rescue them before they expire from an excess of blood to the brain.

“What IS That SMELL...?!” The PCs detect the atrocious odor coming from Feeri’s den. Investigating could bring them to the attention of the Araki guards, who wouldn’t mind adding another morsel to the vat.

Credits

This character is taken from “Friends, Foes, and Followers, Part 13” on Lythia.com (https://www.lythia.com/game_aides/fff-gargu/), by Shawn Bond, with illustrations by Richard Luscheck, and is “fanon”, a derivative work of copyrighted material by Columbia Games Inc. and N. Robin Crossby.
